channel.title: CVE Feed for Magic Hills Pty Ltd -- Wonder Slider Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Magic Hills Pty Ltd -- Wonder Slider Lite

item.title: CVE-2024-24877|2024-07-05T17:21:41.888Z -- magic%20hills%20pty%20ltd -- wonder%20slider%20lite
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Magic Hills Pty Ltd Wonder Slider Lite allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Wonder Slider Lite: from n/a through 13.9.
